name: Turbo Duck Sim 2020
description:
Explore the vast world and relentless reality of what ducks go through every day. Unimaginable fun and  havoc ready to be wrought by your feathers while you push the very edges of your conscience.

Heavily influenced by Duck Sim 2008 by I-smel from newgrounds, the award winning and front paged flash game unparalleled for it's time.

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/476187
